Deemos: I was off killing my ingrate family. It was for their own good. I t=
ried not to argue with Shokaract, but he didn't like me or my decisions. Th=
e good thing is that we're still together Sharpedge.
~~~~~~
Shokaract: Yes,=
 yes, grand idea. But the only problem is that with our low numbers, we mig=
ht have to temporarily ally ourselves with someone...

  ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent:=
 Wednesday, April 18, 2001 7:45 AM
  Subject: Falcon and Snare/My Mafia mem=
bers


  :::Falcon/Snare/Sharpedge/Jetstorm/Godfather::: 

  ::Falcon's eye=
s narrow:: 
  Falcon: Coward! 
  ::He's about to go after him but Snare hol=
ds him back:: 
  Snare: Come on, brother, you know he would have killed us.=
 
  Falcon: I know, but all of our enemies have eluded us, during our entir=
e time 
  on this planet. 
  Snare: Don't worry, we'll catch our break too.=
 
  ::They look at Neody:: 
  Falcon: I have no idea. 
  Snare: You alright=
? 
  ~~~~~ 
  Sharpedge: Well, I was happy.  But that Shockaract guy probab=
ly wasn't, 
  judging from some of the stuff you guys argued about.  Where =
were you anyway? 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Jetstorm and Godfather looked at each other =
worriedly:: 
  Jetstorm: uh, right. 
  Godfather: what do you say we just f=
ind a new base or something? 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
